thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 26 of 7163
thread.title: Don

author: Don
title: Don
text: Whenever I need to find a product in professional audio, my FIRST stop is the B&H website! I can search and find exactly what I need, or get some online help to find what I'm looking for. There are always great sales and low prices, ordering and delivery are both fast and painless. I used to deal with other New York pro audio businesses, but they're either out of business or no longer carry what I'm looking for. B&H ROCKS!! :o)
